ðŸ“– Summary: Mousemaster enables users to control their mouse cursor using only a keyboard, offering an alternative to traditional mouse input. It provides multiple navigation modes, including normal, hint, grid, and screen selection, all of which are fully customizable. This tool aims to enhance accessibility and productivity by providing a mouseless experience.
